thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 45 of 7354
thread.title: Howard

author: Howard
title: Howard
text: Simply put, this is is the best photo and electronics store! You always get knowledgeable and unbiased product information, whether at the store or through customer service over the phone. Pricing is competitive and they will, often, price match if you find a lower price elsewhere. And if you place an order, their efficiency in shipping and getting the order to you is at times astonishing. Their return/exchange policy and practices are customer friendly. Can't say enough good things about B & H!
